languages.text: "Вольному Торговцу надлежит доставить меня в систему, в которой расположен {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g} Кьява Гамма. Затем я сопровожу тебя в визите на планету и выясню, что именно задумал культ на планете и каким образом планирует использовать попавшие в их лапы ресурсы — ресурсы, которые могут включать в себя священные машины Адептус Механикус и даже самих последователей Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: "Вольному Торговцу надлежит доставить меня в систему, в которой расположен индустриальный мир Кьява Гамма. Затем я сопровожу тебя в визите на планету и выясню, что именно задумал Культ на планете и каким образом планирует использовать попавшие в их лапы ресурсы — ресурсы, которые могут включать в себя священные машины Адептус Механикус и даже самих последователей Омниссии".

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."
languages.original_text: "Вольному Торговцу надлежит доставить меня в систему, в которой расположен {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g} Кьява Гамма. Затем я сопровожу тебя в визите на планету и выясню, что именно задумал культ на планете и каким образом планирует использовать попавшие в их лапы ресурсы — ресурсы, которые могут включать в себя священные машины Адептус Механикус и даже самих последователей Омниссии".

I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the Cult is planning and how it is intends to use the resources that have fallen into their grasp — which may very well include the blessed engines of Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

"The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system with the industrial world of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the Cult is planning and how it is intends to use the resources that have fallen into their grasp — which may very well include the blessed engines of Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the Cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

"The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the Cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería transportarme al sistema que contiene el {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma. Debo acompañarle a la superficie para descubrir qué planea el Culto y qué uso tiene pensado para los recursos que han caído en sus garras... lo que podría incluir los benditos motores del Adeptus Mechanicus e incluso a los propios seguidores del Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería transportarme al sistema que contiene el mundo industrial de Kiava Gamma. Debo acompañarle a la superficie para descubrir qué planea el Culto y qué uso tiene pensado para los recursos que han caído en sus garras... lo que podría incluir los benditos motores del Adeptus Mechanicus e incluso a los propios seguidores del Omnissiah».

languages.text: “行商浪人应该把我送到{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}基亚瓦伽马星所在的星系。在那之后，我会陪同你前往该行星，确认邪教的计划，弄清楚他们打算如何使用落入他们手中的资源。这些资源可能会包括机械修会受祝福的机甲，甚至可能包括欧姆尼塞亚的信徒。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人应该把我送到工业世界基亚瓦伽马星所在的星系。在那之后，我会陪同你前往该行星，确认邪教的计划，弄清楚他们打算如何使用落入他们手中的资源。这些资源可能会包括机械修会受祝福的机甲，甚至可能包括欧姆尼塞亚的信徒。”
“行商浪人应该把我送到{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}基亚瓦伽马星所在的星系。在那之后，我会陪同你前往该行星，确认邪教的计划，弄清楚他们打算如何使用落入他们手中的资源。这些资源可能会包括机械修会受祝福的机甲，甚至可能包括欧姆尼塞亚的信徒。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者なら、キアヴァ・ガンマの{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}がある星系に連れて行ってくれることでしょう。そうすれば、我は地上まで同行し、教団の企みと奴らの手中に落ちた資源の使用目的を突き止められられます。帝国技術局の祝福されたエンジンや、万機神そのものの信者だって対象になる可能性は大いにあるわけです」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者なら、キアヴァ・ガンマの{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}がある星系に連れて行ってくれることでしょう。そうすれば、我は地上まで同行し、教団の企みと奴らの手中に落ちた資源の使用目的を突き止められられます。帝国技術局の祝福されたエンジンや、万機神そのものの信者だって対象になる可能性は大いにあるわけです」
「自由開拓者なら、キアヴァ・ガンマの{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}がある星系に連れて行ってくれるだろう。そうすれば、俺は地上まで同行し、魔女団の企みと奴らの手中に落ちた資源の使用目的を突き止められるーー帝国技術局の祝福されたエンジンや、万機神そのものの信者だって対象になる可能性は大いにあるわけだ」

languages.text: "Der Freihändler soll mich zu dem System bringen, das die {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma beheimatet. Dort werde ich Euch auf die Oberfläche begleiten, um in Erfahrung zu bringen, was der Kult plant und wie er die Ressourcen zu nutzen gedenkt, die ihm in die Hände gefallen sind ... und die gesegneten Maschinen des Adeptus Mechanicus ebenso umfassen könnten, wie die Gefolgsleute des Omnissiah selbst."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Der Freihändler soll mich zu dem System bringen, das die Produktionswelt Kiava Gamma beheimatet. Dort werde ich Euch auf die Oberfläche begleiten, um in Erfahrung zu bringen, was der Kult plant und wie er die Ressourcen zu nutzen gedenkt, die ihm in die Hände gefallen sind ... und die gesegneten Maschinen des Adeptus Mechanicus ebenso umfassen könnten, wie die Gefolgsleute des Omnissiah selbst."

languages.text: « Vous devriez me conduire au système où se trouve le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma. Une fois là-bas, je vous accompagnerai à la surface afin de déterminer ce que le culte manigance et comment il compte employer les ressources dont il s'est emparé, ressources qui pourraient bien inclure les machines bénies de l'Adeptus Mechanicus et même les fidèles de l'Omnimessie eux-mêmes. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez me conduire au système où se trouve le monde industriel de Kiava Gamma. Une fois là-bas, je vous accompagnerai à la surface afin de déterminer ce que le culte manigance et comment il compte employer les ressources dont il s'est emparé, ressources qui pourraient bien inclure les machines bénies de l'Adeptus Mechanicus et même les fidèles de l'Omnimessie eux-mêmes. »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir beni {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama'yı içeren sisteme götürmeli. Ardından sana yüzeye kadar eşlik edeceğim ve tarikatın neler planladığını, eline geçirdiği kaynakları nasıl kullanma niyetinde olduğunu öğreneceğim. Bu arada ellerine geçirdikleri şeyler arasında Adeptus Mechanicus'un kutsanmış motorları ve hatta bizzat Hermesih'in takipçileri bile olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should deliver me to the system that contains the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. I will then accompany you to the surface and determine what the cult is planning and how it intends to use the resources that have fallen into their clutches — which may very well include the blessed engines of the Adeptus Mechanicus and even the followers of the Omnissiah themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir beni {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama'yı içeren sisteme götürmeli. Ardından sana yüzeye kadar eşlik edeceğim ve tarikatın neler planladığını, eline geçirdiği kaynakları nasıl kullanma niyetinde olduğunu öğreneceğim. Bu arada ellerine geçirdikleri şeyler arasında Adeptus Mechanicus'un kutsanmış motorları ve hatta bizzat Hermesih'in takipçileri bile olabilir."
